channel.title: CVE Feed for boldthemes -- Bold Page Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for boldthemes -- Bold Page Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-47391|2024-10-07T13:17:41.523Z -- boldthemes -- bold%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BoldThemes Bold Page Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Bold Page Builder: from n/a before 5.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-47298|2024-10-07T13:09:06.819Z -- boldthemes -- bold%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BoldThemes Bold Page Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Bold Page Builder: from n/a through 5.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-7100|2024-08-01T21:52:30.616Z -- boldthemes -- bold%20page%20builder
item.description: The Bold Page Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's bt_bb_button shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 5.0.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
